ygData.subject: Re: Pillar of Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: It is either in the Wizards guild in Erudite or the Library I really don t remember but I did see it last night...
ygData.messageBody:
It is either in the Wizards guild in Erudite or the Library I really
don't remember but I did see it last night...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Windows/BrownG/bryson On Behalf Of Valacian
> Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 9:32 AM
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Re: Pillar of Fire
>
> Where in the Erudin library can you buy this? I have looked for it and
> found nothing!
>
> Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Powell, Scott [SMTP:powells@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 7:25 AM
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Pillar of Fire
>
> From: "Powell, Scott" <powells@...>
>
> No it is not you can but it at the Erudin Library.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: aweber [mailto:aweber@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 4:02 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Pillar of Fire
>
>
> Pillar of Fire is a research only spell.
>
> not sure how to make though.
>
> Nevyn
>
